markdownRemark.excerpt: From  Hacker News : Java is a bureaucratic language. You have to cross your t’s dot your i’s, fill out your requests in triplicate at the FactoryFactoryFactory…
markdownRemark.html:
From Hacker News:

Java is a bureaucratic language. You have to cross your t’s dot your i’s, fill out your requests in triplicate at the FactoryFactoryFactory to get the objectOfYourDesire.

(And probably C# too, but to a lesser extent :-p)

frontmatter.title: Quick Tech Tip - Rails and Amazon ECS and 'missing' Gems
